Class DesignProjectMain

  • java.lang.Object
    • ca.mcgill.ecse211.project.DesignProjectMain

  • public class DesignProjectMain
extends java.lang.Object
    "DesignProjectMain" class is responsible of initiating all sensors and managing(calling/starting) methods and threads

    1.3
    Author:
    Maxime Cardinal
